successDescription: Your changes have been saved successfully.
error: An error has occurred! Please try again later.
errorDescription: An error has occurred while saving your changes. Please try again later.
namesDescription: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile and in emails.
emailOrPhone: Cell phone number or e-mail address
emailFieldDescription: This email address will be used for communications and some basic account functions.
phoneFieldDescription: This cell phone number will be used for communications and some basic account functions.
dateOfBirthDescription: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age. You must be at least 18 years old to use this service.
socialMediaFieldDescription: Add links to your social media profiles to share them with other users.
socialMediaLinkPlaceholder: Enter the link to your social media profile
genderFieldDescription: Your gender will be used to personalize your experience on the site.
documentFieldDescription: Add your identification document to verify your identity.
